channel.title: MONEY FOR NOTHING THEME
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "MONEY FOR NOTHING THEME" - Is it still exist ?

item.title: Re: MONEY FOR NOTHING THEME
item.content:encoded: It is any party house game at all. My recommendation for easy spending is either cheating at the wheel or doing a lot of Jackpot in one day.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
do i need spent ryo in specific games or anything games, no matter what games is, as long in party house ?
i will bug report it if in this season i still don't get it. maybe i missed something at last season.
ty

item.title: Re: MONEY FOR NOTHING THEME
item.content:encoded: ;500K ryo ON THE PARTY HOUSE? it's very important that you spent at least 500K specifically in the party house mini-games. If you didn't get it, more than likely you didn't spend that much in the PH.

item.title: Re: MONEY FOR NOTHING THEME
item.content:encoded: If you're sure you spent enough to get the theme, and didn't get it, bug report it.

item.title: MONEY FOR NOTHING THEME
item.content:encoded:
the last day before i loop at last season, i spent 500k ryo. plus 150k for the rack. and some ryo from scratchy game, i believe i spent more than enough to get "money for nothing" ending theme.
but i don't get it.
this time i want to try it again, if this theme is still exist.

ty
